title: Spiced gingerbread pudding
description: If you can, wrap and keep this tea time treat for a few days before eating – its stickiness will develop as it matures.
ingredients: 2 tbsp ground ginger (or according to taste – this makes for quite a hot cake)
½ tsp cayenne pepper (or more if you want it very hot)
50g/1¾ oz syrup from the jar of stem ginger (optional – replace with more golden syrup or honey if not using stem ginger)
1 jar stem ginger, drained, washed and very finely chopped (optional)
